creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: five vertical panels sewn together with image at center; visible white stitching along edges and seams; diagonal image (LL to UR) of a bundle of green, white, orange, and blue ribbons gathered together and tied with blue ribbon
title: Bedding cover (futonji) or furniture cover (yutan) with bundled abalone (tabane-noshi) motif
